remarks: Lemma for ~ uniioombl .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-May-2015.)
statement:
uniioombl.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : NN --> ( <_ i^i ( RR X. RR ) ) ) $.
uniioombl.2 $e |- ( ph -> Disj_ x e. NN ( (,) ` ( F ` x ) ) ) $.
uniioombl.3 $e |- S = seq 1 ( + , ( ( abs o. - ) o. F ) ) $.
uniioombl.a $e |- A = U. ran ( (,) o. F ) $.
uniioombl.e $e |- ( ph -> ( vol* ` E ) e. RR ) $.
uniioombl.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
uniioombl.g $e |- ( ph -> G : NN --> ( <_ i^i ( RR X. RR ) ) ) $.
uniioombl.s $e |- ( ph -> E C_ U. ran ( (,) o. G ) ) $.
uniioombl.t $e |- T = seq 1 ( + , ( ( abs o. - ) o. G ) ) $.
uniioombl.v $e |- ( ph -> sup ( ran T , RR* , < ) <_ ( ( vol* ` E ) + C ) ) $.
uniioombllem2a $p |- ( ( ( ph /\ J e. NN ) /\ z e. NN ) -> ( ( (,) ` ( F ` z ) ) i^i ( (,) ` ( G ` J ) ) ) e. ran (,) ) $.
$d A x z $.
$d C x z $.
$d F x z $.
$d G x z $.
$d J x z $.
$d T x z $.
$d ph x z $.
$d x z $.
